Intervention.evidence: The 3-mo 2-h OGTT (end of treatment) was 141.00 ± 62.44 mg/dL in the sitagliptin arm and 165.22 ± 72.03 mg/dL ( P = 0.218) in the placebo arm.

Objective.evidence: The primary efficacy objective was to improve 2-h oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) by > 20 mg/dL at 3 mo posttransplant.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary efficacy objective was to improve 2-h oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) by > 20 mg/dL at 3 mo posttransplant.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Sixty-one patients consented, and 50 patients were analyzed.

Number_Analysed.evidence: Sixty-one patients consented, and 50 patients were analyzed.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The 3-mo 2-h OGTT (end of treatment) was 141.00 ± 62.44 mg/dL in the sitagliptin arm and 165.22 ± 72.03 mg/dL ( P = 0.218) in the placebo arm.
